content:
This PR contains three lemmas where we pass from BijOn s t to BijOn s' t' for supersets of s and t. They are a little fiddly to state, but I think they have enough general-purpose potential to warrant inclusion in mathlib. (I would be happy to learn that this can be done a simpler way. )

Unfortunately this is blocking my next large matroid PR; it would be great if someone could take a look at this!
